entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
